resources.string:
To start a round, choose an amount and place a bet. 
 At the start of each round, two cards are dealt to the player face up. 
 Two cards will also be dealt to the dealer: one card facing up, the other face down. 
 If no one scores a Lucky 9, the player can choose to "Hit" to get another card or simply "Stand."
 The player wins if his hand total is closer to 9 than the dealer"s hand total.
 Tip: Only players who cash out will be added to the leaderboard.
